protein.general_function: Involved in hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides, in phosphorus-containing anhydrides
protein.specific_function: Hydrolyzes UDP-glucose to glucose 1-phosphate and UMP and ADP-ribose to ribose 5-phosphate and AMP. The physiological substrate is probably UDP-glucose. Poor activity on other substrates such as ADP-glucose, CDP-glucose, GDP-glucose and GDP-mannose.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides
hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides, in phosphorus-containing anhydrides

reference.reference_text: Deng Y, Madan A, Banta AB, Friedman C, Trask BJ, Hood L, Li L: Characterization, chromosomal localization, and the complete 30-kb DNA sequence of the human Jagged2 (JAG2) gene. Genomics. 2000 Jan 1;63(1):133-8.
